data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you always face forward, you will always make it to the center of the room. If you are always face forward, you will always make it. If you are always facing left, you will always make it back. If you are always facing right, you will always make it back. If you are always facing forward, you will always make it back. So, the answer is No.

Take 4 steps and turn around. Turn around and turn right. So, the answer is no.

You need to circle back and forth for the 2 steps. Turn around so that you are circling the planet. If you circle you must circle one more time. So, the answer is Yes.

Take 1 step first to take 4 steps. After 7 steps, take 7 steps. Take 5 steps to return to the starting point. So, the answer is Yes.
